name: Pinaccuracy
description:
Mini Golf becomes extra thought-provoking when crossed with educational trivia! Pinaccuracy is an educational, multiplayer golf game made in Unity with a mobile framework. The original, physical game by Knucklebones requires players to perform a skill-based action in real time in order to demonstrate educational knowledge and critical thinking. In the same vein, this digital version has you putting your ball across a small course and answering a four-answer question by putting into the golf hole containing the right answer. This version also features mini golf obstacles you would only see in a digital world, keeping you on your toes while simultaneously adding to the fun.

Controls:

Mouse/Cursor - click and drag on your golf ball to putt in the direction opposite the pull

Shift - Zoom out/in to see the entire course, as well as answers and holes containing the answers
